briefTitle: A Pivotal Efficacy Trial to Evaluate HLD200 in Children With ADHD in a Classroom Setting
officialTitle: Ph 3 Multicenter OL Treatment-optimized RDBPC Forced-withdrawal, Parallel Grp Study to Evaluate Safety & Efficacy of Evening Dosed HLD200, a Novel DR/ER Formulation (DELEXIS) of MPH HCl in Children Aged 6-12 With ADHD in Classroom Setting
summary: This Phase 3 pivotal efficacy trial will examine the effects of HLD200 (methylphenidate) in patients aged 6-12 years with ADHD in a laboratory classroom setting. This study has a 6-week open-label treatment optimization period followed by a one week randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled test phase.

primaryOutcome.measure: Swanson, Kotkin, Agler, M-Flynn and Pelham Combined Score (SKAMP CS) - Model-adjusted Average of All Post-dose Time Points Assessed During a Laboratory Classroom Test Day (Visit 9).
